paragraph: Derwin Schlecker (born Derwin Dicker, 1980), professionally known as Gold Panda, is a British electronic record producer and songwriter.

Derwin Schlecker was born Derwin Dicker in 1980 in Peckham, London, England, and was raised in Chelmsford, Essex. He lived in Japan and studied at the School of Oriental and African Studies at the University of London.

Gold Panda released several small-issue 7" records and singles in 2009, and in 2010 he signed with Ghostly International to release his debut full-length Lucky Shiner. In 2013, Gold Panda released his second album, Half of Where You Live.
On 27 May 2016, Gold Panda's third album, Good Luck and Do Your Best, was released via City Slang. Gold Panda released a new single on 16 October 2020 titled Most Books That I've Never Read.
Derwin Dicker also performs house music as DJ Jenifa, .
